text: The 2016 DHB-Pokal was the 41st edition of the tournament. ==Format== The first round was split in a north and a south part and played in mini tournaments where only the winner advance to the round of 16. From there on a knockout system was used to determine the winner. The final four will be played on one weekend in Hamburg. ==Round 1== Games were played on 27 and 28 August 2016.Round 1 schedule |- |colspan=3|North |- |colspan=3|Played in Rostock |- |colspan=3|Played in Minden |- |colspan=3|Played in Nordhorn |- |colspan=3|Played in Hamm |- |colspan=3|Played in Wilhelmshaven |- |colspan=3|Played in Essen |- |colspan=3|Played in Bad Schwartau |- |colspan=3|Played in Solingen |- |colspan=3|South |- |colspan=3|Played in Erlangen |- |colspan=3|Played in Bietigheim |- |colspan=3|Played in Lößnitz |- |colspan=3|Played in Kreuztal |- |colspan=3|Played in Saarlouis |- |colspan=3|Played in Fürstenfeldbruck |- |colspan=3|Played in Coburg |- |colspan=3|Played in Neuhausen |} ==Round 2== The draw was held on 31 August 2016. \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ==Quarterfinals== The draw was held on 2 November 2016. \---- \---- \---- ==Final four== The final four was held on 8 and 9 April 2017 at the Barclaycard Arena in Hamburg. The draw was held on 13 January 2017. ===Bracket=== ===Semifinals=== \---- ===Final=== ==References== ==External links== *Official website 2017 Category:2016 in German sport Category:2017 in German sport
title: 2016–17 DHB-Pokal
